definition: pit/threshold/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing water/☵
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
bumpy (of a road)/rough (of life)/to be down on one's luck/to be full of frustrations and dashed hopes
variant of 門檻|门槛[men2 kan3]
karez, qanat or "horizontal well" (irrigation and water management system used in Xinjiang, Central Asia and Middle East)
potholed and bumpy road (idiom); fig. full of disappointment and dashed hopes

sentences.english: They are both "ridges" people cannot crossover.
sentences.chinese: 它們都是人們過不往的“坎”。
塔爾坎對這一提議不以爲然。

sentences.english: But it's just a matter for her to get through one of those big ones .
sentences.chinese: 但那只是她取得這些成績的過程中的一道坎。

sentences.english: "This is tearing people apart, " said Minnewaukan Mayor Trish McQuoid, fighting back tears.
sentences.chinese: 密尼沃坎鎮長麥闊伊德含淚說，這把人們都逼瘋了。

sentences.english: So how do you conquer this last obstacle to fluency?
sentences.chinese: 因此如何克服通向英語流利程度的最後一道坎呢？

sentences.english: The high adaptation capability of AMD meant that car door panels and sill could also be retained.
sentences.chinese: 由於AMD的高適應性使得轎門和地坎也得以保留。

sentences.english: The structure of the flows is predicted accurately.
sentences.chinese: 準確預測了底坎整流的流動場結構。

sentences.english: Official sanction and funding are only the first hurdles.
sentences.chinese: 官方的批准和資金支持不過是第一道坎。

sentences.english: Will Ferguson revitalise Owen's career in much the same manner he did Eric Cantona's?
sentences.chinese: 爵爺能讓歐文的職業生像坎通納那樣涯峯迴路轉嗎？

sentences.english: Murali has a Masters in Technology from Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur.
sentences.chinese: 穆若立在坎普爾的印度科技學院科技取得碩士學位。

sentences.english: He is currently Director of the Center for Non-Verbal Studies in Spokane, Washington.
sentences.chinese: 他目前是對非語言研究中心主任在斯波坎，華盛頓。

sentences.english: And I'll no longer be a Capulet.
sentences.chinese: 我再也不做坎普萊特家的人。

sentences.english: At number one is Teotihuacán located on the bay of Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 位列第一的是出於墨西哥灣的特奧蒂瓦坎古城。

sentences.english: Size of base aerator should be considered in design of a lateral aerator.
sentences.chinese: 在設計側牆摻氣坎時，需同時考慮底部摻氣坎的尺寸。

sentences.english: Kamprad's official title with the company now is senior adviser.
sentences.chinese: 坎普拉德對外宣稱的頭銜是宜家高級顧問。

sentences.english: Kampradâ€™s official title with the company now is senior adviser.
sentences.chinese: 坎普拉德對外宣稱的頭銜是宜家高級顧問。

definition: one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing mountain/☶/ancient Chinese compass point: 45° (northeast)
to obey/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing wood and wind/☴/ancient Chinese compass point: 135° (southeast)
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
checkpoint (for taxation, security etc)/barrier/hurdle/red tape/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]
to divine/to forecast or estimate/(of a place to live etc) to choose
to cross over/to transcend/to cover distance/to overcome/to rise above
